Federal Highway Stuart FL 34994 (772) 600-5596 Send Email Visit My Company Hours: Open 7 days a week at 11:30 About Us Ocean Republic Brewing, located in the heart of Stuart, Florida, is a local favorite known for its craft beers brewed on site. In addition to its wide selection of house-made brews, the brewery also boasts a full liquor and wine bar. Ocean Republic offers a diverse kitchen menu, featuring everything from juicy burgers to signature beerzas (pizza) made with their flagship Flocal beer, mouthwatering tacos, and even poutine. Whether you're coming for the drinks or the food, there's something for everyone at Ocean Republic Brewing. The place is kids and pets friendly.
